name: @whalewatch/shared
description: Shared types and utilities for WhaleWatch project

scripts.build: tsc --module ES2020 --target ES2020 && tsc --module CommonJS --target ES2020 --outDir dist/cjs && find dist/cjs -name '*.js' -exec sh -c 'mv "$1" "${1%.js}.cjs"' _ {} \; && find dist/cjs -name '*.cjs' -exec sed -i '' 's/require("\.\/types\/index")/require("\.\/types\/index.cjs")/g' {} \; && find dist/cjs -name '*.cjs' -exec sed -i '' 's/require("\.\/utils\/\([^"]*\)")/require("\.\/utils\/\1.cjs")/g' {} \; && find dist/cjs -name '*.cjs' -exec sed -i '' 's/require("\.\/\([^"]*\)")/require("\.\/\1.cjs")/g' {} \; && find dist/cjs -name '*.cjs' -exec sed -i '' 's/\.cjs\.cjs/.cjs/g' {} \;
